Squizzy::

She uncoverd the bots and stood back. She had seen battle damaged 
bots before, but not quite like this. She put her hand over her mouth 
and looked at the bodies. Her face lost it's color and she felt her 
stomach turn over. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::FZ::
> 
> FZ nods, walking over to one of the tables and lifting the cover.
> 
> "This is Feline," he says, gesturing to the pieces, "An Alliance 
> member. The other one is Beholder, who is one of the Mafia members. 
> We're allied with them right now, and this bot is one of their 
> gestalt team's, which'll come in useful in a battle.
> 
>
